title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 60.6 - Department review of preliminary applications; determination
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 60.6 - Department review of preliminary applications; determination

State Regulations

The appropriate regional office of the department shall
review the preliminary applications, and upon a determination that they are
complete and in compliance with the regional economic development strategy, shall forward the preliminary applications with a recommendation and comments
to the department's central office for a determination of eligibility and
availability of funds. The department shall review the preliminary application
in accordance with the evaluation criteria specified in section
60.4
of this Part, and shall
approve or disapprove the preliminary applications and so notify the
applicants. If the department determines that a preliminary application is
inadequate, the applicant shall be so notified and given the opportunity to
reapply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
60.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
